title: Smart data models - ACDSiMeasurement schema
description: A set of measurements in an ACDSi campaign pertaining to a single person.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It must be equal to `ACDSiMeasurement`

bodyMassIndex.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. A measurement relating body weight to height in an organism; typically calculated as the weight of an individual divided by the height of that individual squared. For quadrupeds, the square of body height is often replaced by the square of body length. Units: 'kilogram per meter squared'

tricepsSkinfold.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Triceps Skinfold description. Units: 'millimetre'

flamingoBalanceTest.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Flamingo Balance Test description. Units: 'second'

handGrip.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Hand Grip description. Units: 'kilogram'

shoulderCircumductionTest.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Shoulder Circumduction Test description. Units: 'centimetre'

sitAndReach.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Sit and Reach description. Units: 'centimetre'

standingLongJump.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Standing Long Jump description. Units: 'centimetre'

20-sDrummingTest.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. 20-s Drumming Test description. Units: 'one'

age.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Age in years at the ACDSi Measurement time. Units: 'year'

personIdentifier.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Text'. Any value identifying the person subject to the ACDSi Measurement. Anonymized and should prevent reidentification.

sex.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Text'. Biological sex is the quality of a biological organism based on reproductive function or organs.

armPlateTapping.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Arm Plate Tapping description. Units: 'one'

backwardsObstacleCourse.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Backwards Obstacle Course description. Units: 'second'

bentArm-hang.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Bent Arm-hang description. Units: 'second'

standAndReach.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/Number'. Stand and Reach description. Units: 'centimetre'
